Reviews.Title: “"Never Again"”
Reviews.Author: PalmettoBay_FLHope_P
Reviews.Content: Let me start with the one positive thing, the staff. Everyone was freindly. It goes down hill from there. The rooms smell bad and we stayed in non smoking rooms. They are dirty. Look behind the night table and you will find built up dust and old papers. And yes there are bugs! We found a type of roach right on the night stand! Gross! So, that's the room. The property is right on a busy roadway so you can expect road noise but this place was beyond noisy! They need to put up trees or some other barrier to tone it down! Finally there was a guest staying there that was allowed to walk around the grounds shouting, talk to himself loudly, throw drinks around the hallway etc. The police had to be called. It did not feel like I was in an upscale community at all. And to think I paid $130.00 a night!!! Never, Never AGAIN! Gross!

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs”
Reviews.Author: Alvin W
Reviews.Content: My Family I all travelled to this location for a wedding, we had 8 people total in our group we paid for two rooms. Well needless to say we found Bed bugs in one of the rooms and we asked to be moved only to be told that they we completely booked up. We showed the front agent one of the bugs we killed and they acted as though they could careless. They refunded the room with the bed bugs and expected all 8 of us to share one room. That wasnt going to happen, I have sense made a complaint with Choice Hotels and the GM stated that they didnt have bugs in the room. If you look at the picture you tell me what it is...

Reviews.Title: “Restful Oasis”
Reviews.Author: michaeljosephsousa
Reviews.Content: I was glad to find this hotel in South Miami, along the busy Route 1 and stayed for 2 nights in February 2012. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful, as were the cleaning staff. The pool area is the real highlight - I lounged around the pool and sundeck for 2 days and had a peaceful rest before travelling back to Germany. Breakfast from 7-10:00 was terrific to just grab a newspaper and have a nice long leisurely breakfast. All in all a terrific stay.

Reviews.Title: “The Staff is Good, the Rooms Notsomuch”
Reviews.Author: henulj-lse
Reviews.Content: Sadly, I can confirm that there are roaches in the rooms at this property. I killed one in the bathroom upon my arrival and my daughter killed one later. It is an older property so once it gets infested, I'm sure it would be hard to totally get rid of the nasty bugs. The beds were so so. The shower was fine. We were there for only one night and just made certain that we left our bags out in the car so we didn't bring any unwanted guests home with us. The checkin and checkout went very well and the staff were very friendly. We did not utilize the pool. I would likely not stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “unbelievable and will come back”
Reviews.Author: justchar529
Reviews.Content: I needed a place to stay while they were repairing my apartment. I live near by, The mamager was very helpful and sincere. The room is clean and near the pool . They provide a light free breakfast which at least will hold you over. The staff is amazing, friendly, pleasant and helpful! House keeping is daily and vey efficient! I would recommend this hotel to anyone! If you need a place to stay while in S. MIami ! Great Service, clean rooms. quiet, pet friendly, ok breakfast, restaurant and bar for dinner. Nice pool. Close to shopping and other restaurants!

Reviews.Title: “filthy, roaches & smelling rooms”
Reviews.Author: QIMCO
Reviews.Content: we reached at 2.45am late night after work and 6 hrs drive.Tired and expecting to find the hotel, we called the hotel for directions. The front desk was not able to guide us right to the hotel inspite of the fact we were so close and had to go in circles.Anyway after waiting on the lobby and getting the room in the backside #129,to our suprise we find roaches in the bathroom. We called front desk and walked all the up to get the room key for #131. As soon as we opened the door the room stunk of bad odor as if someone had puked in the room. We called the front desk again and he veriifed coming to the room and was shocked . He was very polite and gave us another room #135. This room was fine.It took us 45 minutes after cheking in to settle down.People peeking in the night as to who had come, also the security guard sitting in the car in front of the lobby. Not a safe location with kids and family.The breakfast was lousy and cold, no scrambled eggs, cold sausages, no waffles.(like other quality inns we stayed).The front desk was not even concerned as we mentioned her about changing 2 rooms due to roaches and smell. Never even apologised for the inconvenience and wait to get into a room.

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly good.”
Reviews.Author: elevendy
Reviews.Content: I had to stay here for a night after emergency car trouble left me stuck in this part of Miami. They accommodated me right away and the people at the front desk were lovely. The property looks dated, but kept up very well. The room was clean and quiet. The free breakfast was pretty good as far as continental breakfasts go (lots of bread choices, fruit, yogurt, eggs, sausages, juice, coffee, tea). The pool area is big and clean with lots of comfortable seats. I had a problem with a charge on my credit card (my bank's fault, not theirs) and they were very helpful. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Checking in late”
Reviews.Author: karens48
Reviews.Content: We made these reservation 6 months ahead of time .. our travel took us late and we checked in around 9pm,,,, We had called and told them that we were coming in late but we were given "pet room " which smelled like a pet room and had stains on the carpet ... The hotel had much nicer rooms .. I feel that this was one of the last rooms left ... From now on .. if we have reservation and we are running late with check in time .. We will call and tell them that we dont want a Pet room .. The pool was nice , the breakfast was good all was good but we were penalized for coming in late

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly Good For an Old Property”
Reviews.Author: Southern_Cross_Gazer
Reviews.Content: We hadn't planned on staying in this part of Miami during our vacation, but found it necessary for a few days and I'm glad we stayed here. This property may have originally a Holiday Inn from the 1960's, but it has been refurbished to a comfortable and affordable Quality Inn. The pool is large and heated and the hot continental breakfast was delicious and filling. Nice comfy bed mattresses and new pillows. The only issue we had was the continuous traffic noise from US 1, the ONLY route to the Keys -- our room was along a wing close to the road. The staff was extremely helpful and courteous during our time of need. Be sure to check out the mall down the street (The Falls), an open-air mall with continuous built-in waterfalls along the midway!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: juliwilde
Reviews.Content: What a great place to stay , really friendly helpful staff , very clean, lovely warm clean pool , poolside towels too! great eatery's closeby . Good lots of choice breakfast -was only supposed to be continental but scrambled egg bacon and sausage were always on offer as well as cereal fruit yoghurt and bagels muffins etc . very impressed . Very relaxing place with many amenities you would expect from a much more expensive hotel . Would always reccomend to anyone . Great value for money .

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Surprise, They got it right every time”
Reviews.Author: morrisiii
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this property for a last minute business trip. I was a late arrival and not sure what to expect. As a former Choice Hotel employee, M.O.D. and Night Auditor, I tend to be very aware of how things should be done in a property, and can be somewhat critical. These folks got it right in ever area. The night Manager was very friendly, efficient, and helpful. Check-in was flawless. This is an older property, and as such could have presented challenges, however, their attention to the things that really matter overcame any issues that could have been a problem. Beds were very comfortable and I slept quiute well. When I called in the AM and asked for a late checkout, the MOD was gracious, and only too glad to accomodate. The Cleanliness of the room in general, carpet, smell, and A/C were great. The beds were made up with military precision, crisp, clean and comfortable. The bathroom was hospital-clean, and the shower was awesome. I was greeted by the Houskeeping Supervisor as I was preparing to check out, and she was also very professional and asked me if everything was okay. Finally, as I checked out and turned in my keys, The Guest Service Rep was so nice and courteous, I will definitely come back to this property anytime I need to be anywhere in or near Miami. This Hotel is in South Miami, on US1, in a really nice area of shops and restaurants, very close to 95 and airport, I could get right downtown in less than 15 minutes. I HIGHLY recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: BunniMinx
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel twice during Art Basel. The rooms were very clean, the pool area is nice, and the staff was very helpful/friendly. This is not a fancy luxury hotel, but it is a clean, safe, and comfortable place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “not pleasant”
Reviews.Content: Bugs in bathroom footprint in bath tub Dustt every where Hair in first bed spider in second bed odor in room

Reviews.Title: “Not very Quality.”
Reviews.Author: sevenday
Reviews.Content: I stayed there for four nights. I walked away with a kind of underwhelmed feeling. Their continental breakfast is... okay. I wasn't terribly impressed with the options - and the yogurt that they had on offer was due to expire the next day, and consequently tasted a bit strange. On the third night I discovered a bug in bed. Not a cockroach but some other kind of winged bug that was promptly evicted - didn't see any others. The showerhead in my room leaked all over the floor, and you had to crank the knob almost all the way around into the "cold" again just to get any hot water at all, and it didn't last long. The vending machines that they have on site for soda and snacks didn't have much of a variety of offerings, and about half of THOSE were sold out the entire time I was there. Of the 3 ice machines I had access to, 1 was broken the entire time, and 1 broke after the second night. There was some snafu with the payment that we're still working to resolve (something about advance payments and how they're handled). For the good: the air conditioner worked, the pool was clean and seemed well maintained, the housekeepers were punctual about cleaning and very helpful when I needed items, even with the Do Not Disturb sign up.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place - friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: feganj
Reviews.Content: This is a nice place and good value. The pool and area is very nice. The rooms are clean and fresh. The staff were very helpful and recommended excellent places and restaruants while in Miami - thank you for making our brief stay a great one !

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: realtorron
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 1 night before a cruise. The room was a bit small but clean and the property was wonderfully landscaped. The staff was polite and helpful. Parking was free and easy. It was about 15 miles to the port down US 1. Shopping and minor dinning was within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Best Deal Going/ Great Service”
Reviews.Author: Railroadguy
Reviews.Content: From the Very First Moment that I called This Hotel From Orlando where I was traveling first, I was greeted by Stanley with Courtesy and Outstanding Customer Service, he took the time to answer all of my questions, and even gave me tips on the shortest route from Orlando to Miami, and less tolls, when we arrived the great staff attended to all our needs and we had the best hotel experience that we have had in a great while, even better than any hilton, or four seasons could do. We have just made our reservations to visit this hotel again in October 2008, and have already called to let them know that we will be returning soon, location great, rates great, service outstanding, located next door to a Publix and across the street from an express bus stop to the Miami Metro which is about a 10 minute ride to the rails, we parked our car at the hotel lot, and never used it again until we left out to drive back to Orlando for another seven days. !!!

Reviews.Title: “Best motel in Miami”
Reviews.Author: MarcusUsa
Reviews.Content: Staying here for the first time in almost 10 years, it only affirmed what I already thought to be true...that this is the best motel in Miami. I spoke to some of the management and for a place that has been in business for 20 years, they still uphold their standards of quality and service and after all this time, still treat their guests perfectly. The rooms are clean, the pool is great, the breakfast is nice, the staff is friendly and attentive and the property is well located near all the Miami "hotspots". Highly recommended and I will stay here every time while in Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience!!”
Reviews.Author: happytravlerKentucky
Reviews.Content: We had a great time staying at the Quality Inn South at the Falls. 06/11/08 From the front desk to the housekeeping staff, they all made you feel very welcome. We arrived a day earlier than our reservation and they were willing to accommodate us.We went for a wedding and made it a great vacation. The room was nice size and very clean. The continental Breakfast was very good The pool was great and very clean. We enjoyed our stay so much that we extended our stay 2 days. Thank You, management and staff for making our Miami trip so much fun!

Reviews.Title: “Pretty Good”
Reviews.Author: JM11traveler
Reviews.Content: We Checked into the Quality Inn at Miami and it looked like a real nice motel on US1. The staff were really nice. We got two rooms (217 and 219) which were connecting rooms towards the back. One of the rooms had a mini kitchenette which the front desk person let us have for the same price as our regular room ($71), The beds were comfortable and the bathroom was clean, just the bathtub was kinda old with paint stains on the bottom. They had a real nice pool area but we didn't get to go swimming because it was too cold. I would definitely stay again and recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great bang for the buck”
Reviews.Author: smithalovestotravel
Reviews.Content: Had no problems at the place. Very well kept and service is great. Breakfast may not be all that, but that didn't bother me too much. Comfortable and clean rooms, friendly service and safe area. Good access to Biscayne blvd, florida turnpike, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel... Only Hotel in this area”
Reviews.Author: H8t2Travel
Reviews.Content: Its a nice hotel. Its the only hotel I was able to find at the last minute. Once you pass this hotel (heading south) there are no other hotels around that I was able to find. Once I got here, I was quite impressed. It looked clean and taken care of. The room was comfortable and very clean. You have a TV, coffee maker, blow dryer, safe, iron and ironing board. However, there was no microwave or fridge in my room (Rm 203). But that was ok since all I was doing was spending one night here for a business trip. The furniture in the room was very nice and it matched. The AC worked too well. Restaurants and other stores were right next door. There's a pretty good Cantonese restaurant in the strip mall next door. Plates ranged from $10-$15 on average. Not sure if the hotel had a pool or excercise room since I didn't have time for that - I was only here to sleep. The area looks safe and ok. The rate I paid was $98 for a single. Still, it beats paying the same rate for a similiar hotel in a ghetto or paying the average $179 elsewhere in the Miami area. My only complaint was that the wireless internet kept booting me off every few minutes. Eventually I gave up. The young lady at the front desk was of no help but then if I can't fix my internet problem(s), then I don't expect hotel employees to know how to fix it either.

Reviews.Title: “ROTTEN CAVE!”
Reviews.Author: Bklynsicilianjcp
Reviews.Content: I was given the room right next to road. The room had a rotten mildew musky smell. My clothers reaked for days after I left. It is much smaller than in the pictures. We only had two small bags, but we were still tripping over our stuff. The room cleanliness was average. The bathroom was full of mildew. There was a strange black spot on the floor near the bowl. Noisy, Noisy, Noisy! It is a stones throw away from Rt. 1so it is extremely noisy. There is a Harley Davidson dealer down the road so you will hear the bikers driving by all day and night. This is not a typical florida motel with a decent size piece of land. Everything is very cramped. Ok so I read the reviews that the pool area is nice. Well it is decent but has very little landscaping. The biggest problem with the pool was not the pool . It was the smell of the garbage dump nearby! It reaked so bad that I had to get out of the pool after a few minutes. This hotel is very far from south beach. At night you can get there in 25 minutes. Daytime 45-1hour if during rush hour. I originally booked for 5 nights i was out of there in 3 nights. I got a much better hotel for half the price using hotwire for the rest of my trip!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: mindy1168
Reviews.Content: My son and I stayed here before and after our cruise Super Bowl weekend. The rooms were clean and it is located in a safe neighborhood. Restaurants and a grocery store are within walking distance. We got to the hotel from our cruise at 8am and it was no problem for us to check in that early. The front desk staff was very helpful and friendly. While we didnt use the pool (it was rainy), it was clean and the pool area was nice. I would stay at this hotel again and recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Looks good outside, but...”
Reviews.Author: kimpete8
Reviews.Content: The outside appearance of the Quality Inn South at the Falls very very nice, but our room needed a thorough cleaning and considerable maintenance work to bring it up to a reasonable standard. On the plus side, the staff was reasonably helpful, and the pool area was very good.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: retiredtraveler6
Reviews.Content: My wife and I and our 3 grandchildren stayed here on April 10th. The price was reasonable (especially with a Choice Hotels over 60 discount). The children liked the pool. The water was warm (which was not true everywere). The rooms were nice. The person behind the desk was not overly friendly, but that was a minor issue. One reason we stayed there was because we were planning to go to the Metro Zoo and to the Fairchild Tropical Gardens on the following day, and the hotel is reasonably close to both of them.

Reviews.Title: “good value”
Reviews.Author: Putzer
Reviews.Content: Very nice motel. The coffee maker was a nice touch, amenities such as hand cream etc. Staff were very pleasant and accomodating. Easy to find. Walk to the nearby pulbix or a very good chinese restaurant "canton". Safe neighbourhood, pool was clean. Well located for shopping and dining while we waited for our cruise to depart. Also, very quiet.

HotelInfo.Name: Quality Inn South at the Falls
HotelInfo.Address: 14501 South Dixie Highway (US 1), Miami, FL 33176-7925
